___i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

___locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.

___areas.description: A list of widget areas with individual properties.

___name.description: Name of the widget-area to create.

___disabledOn.description: Name of the flag toggling the area's disabled state.

___validOn.description: Name of the flag toggling the area's visualisation of validity.

___anonymize.description: If true the class 'ax-anonymize-me' is set on the label to support anonymization.

___selection.description: Action that is emitted after the (possibly confirmed) selection of an area.

___selectionRequest.description: Actions under which the widget requests selection of this area and then waits for confirmation.

___action.description: Action topic that to request a selection of this area.

___selectionRequestTrigger.description: Action upon which the widget requests selection of the given area.

items.description: The action topic to trigger a selection request for this area.

___flag.description: Name of the flag indicating the area's visibility.

___taggedOn.description: Name of the flag toggling the 'is-tagged' class on the according area.

name: AxAccordionWidget
description: Displays multiple areas in the form of an accordion.
